thread.title: Very pleasant hotel in a good location for a reasonable price
thread.title_full: Very pleasant hotel in a good location for a reasonable price - Review of Hotel Vaneau Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: elenaZ3264FQ
title: Very pleasant hotel in a good location for a reasonable price
text: Easy to reach from the airport CDG by public transport. Quiet location, many attractions within walking distance. A lovely building, nice rooms (not smal!l). Has everything you need including tea accessorizes. Friendly and professional staff. Good Breakfast, perhaps a bit expensive. Close to many shops, cafes, restaurants. Highly recommend.
